title: PLAZA / TIRETRACKS VISCAL
description: You notice a set of a motor carriage tracks backing into the fence.

dialogueTree.title: Visual Calculus: "The tracks are as they have ever be..."
dialogueTree.text: The tracks are as they have ever been. A bit more worn, perhaps. Fortunately, the street sweeper still hasn't noticed their presence.

links.title: You: ""A car drove through the fence.""
links.text: "A car drove through the fence."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You are correct. This is a rather..."
links.text: "You are correct. This is a rather motor carriage-friendly city."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Somehow that makes you feel... scar..."
links.text: Somehow that makes you feel... scared. You don't know why.

links.title: You: ""Is this connected to the case?""
links.text: "Is this connected to the case?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm not sure... there are plenty o..."
links.text: "I'm not sure... there are plenty of traffic accidents waiting to happen in Martinaise. With the jam right here on the roundabout. I would keep them separate."

links.title: Visual Calculus: "You could *follow* the tracks south..."
links.text: You could *follow* the tracks south. There seems to be a canal there. See where they went. (If you find the time.)

links.title: You: ""This is where I started off with m..."
links.text: "This is where I started off with my motor carriage... before sinking it in the sea."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No wonder the cafeteria manager se..."
links.text: "No wonder the cafeteria manager seemed frustrated when he was giving us directions to the yard."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well," he gestures toward the gapi..."
links.text: "Well," he gestures toward the gaping hole in the fence, "you did provide us with a very convenient access point to the crime scene."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, it is. Well," he gestures tow..."
links.text: "Yes, it is. Well," he gestures toward the gaping hole in the fence, "you did provide us with a very convenient access point to the crime scene."

links.title: You: ""This is the point of departure of..."
links.text: "This is the point of departure of the vehicle that crashed into the Samaran Butter sign."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant follows the tracks w..."
links.text: The lieutenant follows the tracks with his gaze. "That's plausible. A similar... reckless abandon seems to be in evidence."

links.title: You: "I think I got it. [Leave.]"
links.text: I think I got it. [Leave.]

links.title: You: "This is significant somehow."
links.text: This is significant somehow.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Maybe. Probably."
links.text: Maybe. Probably.

links.title: Inland Empire: "An ominous warning of bad things ah..."
links.text: An ominous warning of bad things ahead.

links.title: You: "This is where I started off with my..."
links.text: This is where I started off with my motor carriage.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Yes. And ended up half-sunken in th..."
links.text: Yes. And ended up half-sunken in the sea. You must have been drunk when you left off.

links.title: You: "This is the point of departure of t..."
links.text: This is the point of departure of the motor carriage that crashed into the Samaran Butter sign, right?

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Why yes it is! Good connection."
links.text: Why yes it is! Good connection.

dialogueTree.title: Perception (Sight): "You see a set of tyre tracks in the..."
dialogueTree.text: You see a set of tyre tracks in the brown slush that covers the plaza mosaic.

links.title: You: "Why am I looking at this?"
links.text: Why am I looking at this?

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Cop habit. You look at everything."
links.text: Cop habit. You look at everything.

links.title: Logic: "This isn't case-related, you think."
links.text: This isn't case-related, you think.

links.title: You: "What kind of vehicle drove through..."
links.text: What kind of vehicle drove through here?

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Hard to say."
links.text: Hard to say.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Hard to say. Your vision is blurred..."
links.text: Hard to say. Your vision is blurred and you are having difficulty concentrating thanks to your relentless hangover.

links.title: You: "Reconstruct the movement."
links.text: Reconstruct the movement.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "The tyre tracks were left here by a..."
links.text: The tyre tracks were left here by an unknown event that took place some days ago. It's a message, written in the language of burnt rubber.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Some of that rubber stuck to the ti..."
links.text: Some of that rubber stuck to the tiles right in front of the Whirling-in-Rags. This is point A. The driver started there...

links.title: Visual Calculus: "...and then accelerated straight in..."
links.text: ...and then accelerated straight into the fence.

links.title: Authority: "The hole in this fence doesn't look..."
links.text: The hole in this fence doesn't look *that* huge.

links.title: You: "Damn bartender."
links.text: Damn bartender.

links.title: Authority: "He was exaggerating. People blame *..."
links.text: He was exaggerating. People blame *cops* for everything that goes wrong in the world. This has nothing to do with you.

links.title: Interfacing: "As a matter of fact, you don't even..."
links.text: As a matter of fact, you don't even know why you stopped here. You would never drive recklessly like this. And you don't have a car.

links.title: You: "The hole is not that impressive."
links.text: The hole is not that impressive.

links.title: You: "Okay. What happened next?"
links.text: Okay. What happened next?

links.title: You: "What happened next?"
links.text: What happened next?

links.title: Visual Calculus: "The driver proceeded to back out of..."
links.text: The driver proceeded to back out of the yard, barely stopping before hitting the adjacent building...

links.title: Visual Calculus: "...before heading south. Must have..."
links.text: ...before heading south. Must have been in a hurry.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "No, these tracks are not interestin..."
links.text: No, these tracks are not interesting at all. Let the street sweeper just sweep them away.

links.title: You: "Not now. [Leave.]"
links.text: Not now. [Leave.]
